 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==be low, humiliated== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְכַךְ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***suck entirely out, diminish, consume***) — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּמֹ֫כּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.43|Ps 106:43]] of perverse Israel **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמַּךְ‎</span> [[Eccl.10.18|Eccl 10:18]] ***sink*** (in decay) of house-timbers. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֻמְּכוּ‎</span> [[Job.24.24|Job 24:24]] ***be brought low***, of wicked. 

I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְלָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלא‎</span>. II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְלָה‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְלוֺל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְלָל‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכְלֻל‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כלל‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכֹּ֫לֶת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אכל‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמָן‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמַנֵּי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כון‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמָס‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמָשׂ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כמס‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמָר‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכְמֹר‎</span>], [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמֶ֫רֶת‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמֹ֫רֶת‎</span> see III.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כמר‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְמְתָת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כמת‎</span>.
